A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a disaster\, pure and simple. The stakes are all over the place\, the plot-threads started in the last movie are wasted\, and all the great themes of the Star wars saga are destroyed (transmission\, gradually learning how to become a hero\, redemption).\nLuke Skywalker deserved better than being portrait as a suicidal bum. And Carrie Fisher's final performance is ruined by the most ridiculous scene of the entire saga. What a shame.
